# Install software (Refer to 'explore data.Rmd' in 'rCode' foler)

```{r}
library(RaschKit)
install_packages_ls()
create_folders() 
```

# Explore functions

Open this .Rmd file via 'xxx.Rproj' in working directory.
Select function below for different cases. Functions would output instructions 
on where to find report and/or result files.

## Dataframe as input

```{r}
Equate(df=df, test='Elana_math', vars=c('NSW', 'VIC'))
# arg 'df': dataframe with cols of 'item','delta.x', error.x','delta.y','error.y'
# .x relates to vars[[1]], .y relates to vars[[2]]
```

## CQ output (.shw) as input

```{r}
Equate_shw(test='elana_math', vars=c('NSW', 'VIC'))
# .shw and other files named as arg 'test' should be in 'output' folder in wd
```

## Horizontal equating

```{r}
Equate_Hrz(test='R', grades=c(3:6), forms=c('A','B'))
# files whose names cover all combinations of args 'grades' and 'forms' (e.g., R_2A.shw)
# should be in 'output' folder in wd
```

## Vertical equating

```{r}
Equate_Vrt(test='R', grades=c(2:10))
# files whose names cover all elements of arg 'grades' (e.g., R_2.shw)
# should be in 'output' folder in wd
```
